Murder Scene - Fashion Film from AV82STUDIO on Vimeo.

Murder Scene - Fashion Film

Murder scene is a Horror fashion film directed by Pedro Santasmarinas. In this project we were responsible for the production department and cinematography.

AV82STUDIO
